means: 发出一种类似尖叫的声音
尖锐的声音：一种能使人联想起这种尖叫的声音

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"喊，叫"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: cry, shout, exclaim, roar, scream, shriek, yell, call
means: cry ： 一般指因恐惧、痛苦、惊奇等而喊叫。
shout ： 指有意识地高声喊叫，常用于提出警告、发命令或唤起注意等。
exclaim ： 多指因高兴、愤怒、痛苦、惊讶等突发感情而高声喊叫。
roar ： 指发出大而深沉的声音、吼叫或咆哮。
scream ： 指因恐具、快乐或痛苦而发出的尖叫声。
shriek ： 指因惊恐、痛苦等或其它感情而发出比scream更为尖锐、刺耳的叫声。
yell ： 多指求援、鼓励时的呼叫。也可指因外界因素刺激而发出尖厉声音。
call ： 指大声说话或喊叫，以引起某人的注意。

sentence.Network_en: The ladies shriek and swoon at his every word.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的每一句话都令那些女士为之尖叫，为之痴狂。

sentence.Network_en: Sue let out a terrific shriek and leapt out of the way.
sentence.Network_cn: 休发出一声尖叫，跳到了一边。

sentence.Network_en: All of a sudden he let out a piercing shriek.

a man died and was taken to his place of eternal torment by the devil . as he passed sulfurous pits and shrieking sinners , he saw a man he recognized as a lawyer snuggling up to a woman .一个男人死后被魔鬼带到他要接受永远的折磨的地方，到处是硫磺坑和尖叫的罪人，突然他看见以前认识的一个律师和一个美女依偎在一起。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (as a verb): imitative; compare with dialect screak, Old Norse skrækja, also with screech

entry.tran: (因惊讶或疼痛等)尖叫;尖声笑
entry.def: When someone shrieks, they make a short, very loud cry, for example because they are suddenly surprised, are in pain, or are laughing.

example.ex: She shrieked and leapt from the bed...
example.tran: 她尖叫一声从床上跳了起来。

entry.def: If you shriek something, you shout it in a loud, high-pitched voice.

example.ex: He was shrieking obscenities and weeping.
example.tran: 他一边哭一边尖声咒骂着脏话。

means.word_mean: 2. a high-pitched noise resembling a human cry;

sentences.sentence: "he ducked at the screechings of shells"
"he heard the scream of the brakes"
